GapFillInput.Title: Gerunds (-ing forms)
GapFillInput.Instruction: Rewrite the sentences using the words in brackets and making any necessary changes and additions.

Content.Question:
1. I think driving a train is stressful (drive / a train / be / stressful).
2. I'm really keen on playing (really / keen / play) tennis.
3. Steve can't stand shopping (not / stand / shop).
4. I'm not very interested in going to the gym (interested / go / to the gym).
5. Karen, do you enjoy sunbathing|did you enjoy sunbathing (you / enjoy / sunbathe)?
6. Oliver is crazy about playing|was crazy about playing|'s crazy about playing
(be / crazy / play) computer games.
7. I find buying presents (buy / presents) very difficult.
8. Does Jenna enjoy dancing|Did Jenna enjoy dancing (Jenna / enjoy / dance)?
